lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We play Dungeons & Dragons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a good one, Liam. Well done. Before we get started on tonight's chaos-- because we've missed you guys these past two weeks. We had the fantastic all-honey Honey Heist in this place last week. Everyone did a great job on that one. Now we're back to see what's going to happen here. We left it a little chaotic last time. Before we get to that, we have some announcements to get through, starting with our fantastic returning sponsors of campaign two, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: D&D Beyond!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe Matt will!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You typed this right in front of me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come and say hi! Oh, but take it away, Travis!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love sports games! And guess what? D&D Beyond will be running a roleplaying roulette one shot on the Pax main stage, which is kind of like football, hyuck hyuck! Marisha says, so like-- sorry. I don't have a good Marisha. So like, you can get more information about the one shot on unplugged.paxsite.com or whatever. I'm cool, I guess. It's weird being next to all these old guys from like the 80s or whatever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll let that one fly, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam will take over.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Time travel!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't read this!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll remember this, Liam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one shot game description is: Want to know what happens when a group of D&D luminaries come together to play completely random characters? So do we. Come join the fun as players create characters at the table during the event, using D&D Beyond's randomize feature to improvise their way through a classic Dungeons & Dragons adventure. The event will be from 1:30 to 2:30 Eastern Time on Saturday. Aah! Next, and look, it's Sam Riegel! Hey, look at me, I need constant attention! Also, D&D Beyond launched their new show, Heroes of the Vale, this week! Join DM Mike Mearls, with players T.J. Storm, Todd Kenreck, Shelly Mazzanoble, and more in this new show set in the Nentir Vale! I'm an egomaniac! Laura has to add on to that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god, why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, check out Heroes of the Vale-- why would she be British? Check out Heroes of the Vale every Wednesday at 2pm Pacific on twitch.tv/dndbeyond, and follow @DnDBeyond for more info. My dice addiction is becoming a problem! Finally, last but not least, Taliesin says--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He says, Non bagno te, bagno il tuo cuore, che sempre piú tu mi possa amare. Semper parere D&D Beyond! He's a crazy figure from Greek legend!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have gained so much weight since that picture, good lord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hope that some of that was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow. Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll also post this in text form somewhere because I don't think anyone was listening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There is some good stuff in there. We'll find a way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There is great stuff and you should check it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Heroes of the Vale thing is actually-- well, that's friend of the show, T.J. Storm. Todd Kenreck also. Mearls is amazing. I've had the opportunity to play with him a couple times, and he's a fantastic DM. Super excited they're actually putting that show together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Check them out at Pax Unplugged this weekend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Oh, and Shelly's in there too. That's right. Awesome. Check that out. All right. Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, while we're on the topic of Sam, you can check out Sam's recent fireside chat we had earlier this week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And his thighs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did have his thighs. It was unlocked because of your guys' fantastic contributions to Pablove's charity that we ran this past month or two ago. You can check it out now at youtube.com/criticalrole. Through the month of November, we're still raising money for Travis' favorite charity, Operation Supply Drop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very soon we will have a first-person shooter with me either doing very well or really sucking and screaming like a little girl. Please donate, share, tell your friends and family. It's almost the end of November and giving love to all of our brothers and sisters in the armed forces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Woo, Travis!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another fun thing. We've teamed up with our good friend, Patrick Rothfuss, and his fantastic charity, Worldbuilders, to create a special set of Vox Machina single-use buff cards that can be used for your own home games. I ask all you dungeon masters out there, if one of your players brings one of these to the table, to the best of your ability, please allow the one use the card allows because, if not, you hate charitable things, and you're a terrible person. They paid good money to help good people to use these cards. If your DM won't let you, you let me know.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll an intimidation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the DM get to keep the ticket if you spend it? Is the question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An eight. That's on par for me, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not higher than 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not high enough for me. I'm not an intimidating sort.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You lead with your heart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Persuasion I can do. For an example, we have the Grog card, where a player of any character can rage once during a combat, regardless of their class, as you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Grog) Yeah, you've got a rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or we have the Vex card, allows you a charisma boost to a persuasion check because you wink, and it improves it dramatically. For every $10 you donate, you'll be entered to win one of these cards. All proceeds go to the Heifer Foundation, who provide long-term solutions for people in need in ways that help those individuals prosper and in turn support their communities. For more info, and to donate and be a part of this, check out http://bit.ly/wbdnd. One more time, you can put in bit.ly/wbdnd.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: W-B-D-N-D.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wih-bih-dib-n-dum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. Excited to be working with Patrick on that. I think you had another announcement. Do you want to make it for us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's going to be some stuff going up!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What stuff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's some stuff, but this is one of them! I wanted to tease you guys. Oh, it's our official Tusk Love notebook, with art lovingly done by @OrcBarbies on Twitter. Yeah. I am in love with this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So in love with this. Carry around your own fabulous romance novel! Then make your own notes in it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is so cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The author's pretty cool too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that Jester on the cover?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course it is!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's the gentleman?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A beautiful Oskar. Oskar and Jester!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, who does it say it was written by?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It says it was written by Matilda Merceria!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's his pen name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, thank you for that. Excited to see that go up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I might use that tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think that's all we have for our announcements, so with that, my friends--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everyone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just your mouth. Just your mouth. You had two noses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I had two noses? There we go. That's much better. Thank you, Sam, for that nightmare fuel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do I have so many teeth?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought it would look weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Last we left off, the Mighty Nein had allied themselves with Captain Avantika of the Squalleater, a pirate making her way through the Swavain Islands in search of ways to unlock this entity that she was fanatically obsessed with, this Uk'otoa, which was revealed to be the patron to Fjord's abilities. After retrieving one of these sought-after orbs from this long-reused temple by the snake folk on the island, and apparently unlocking one of these seals, you made your way back to Darktow on her ship, did a bit of piracy. Arrived, were introduced to the Plank King, who looks over the Revelry, the band of pirates that helm this side, pardon me, of the Lucidian Ocean. You then decided to have a plan to break into the Squalleater at night while everyone was at rest, or some of you at rest. Some were distracting the captain. In doing so, you managed to uncover a well-hidden journal of Avantika that was written in some sort of a cipher.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kind of like the journal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, the morning in which you awoke, you discovered that the crew, at least, had seemed to have noticed all these strange events through the night. The ransacked chamber pointed to some tomfoolery. You were all asked to make your way to the shipyard to meet with Avantika and the crew on the Squalleater. With not far behind you on the docks the rest of the crew of the Mistake being brought as well. Upon you stepping up and encountering this moment of tension, it seems that, through Vera's glance through some form of divination magic, while some people have guarding objects or items against themselves being sought through divination, certain objects in pockets are not free of it. They glanced over in Caleb's direction, and in that moment, you cast Wall of Fire. Before we get too far into this, I need you to place your Wall of Fire for me, please, on this battlefield.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take your time, take your time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What can it do? Can it go up things?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20 feet tall. I can choose which side the wall burns, 10-feet reach, and which side does not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that's good. That's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is going to be hard on the boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take your time, take your time. The longer you take--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This table can't bear my weight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It can too, because we all got on the table for Sam's one shot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now available on YouTube, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, while you're doing this, I'm going to put this up there, now the announcements are complete.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know how I would make it go on an angle without causing problems.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll just assume it covers that, right? Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, best you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Best I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh sweet Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're creating a U?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that possible?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, this isn't what I imagined in my head, but we are standing where we are standing, so I'm going with what I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I dig it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I want that to go like that, but it's not going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The whole show is just this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is it. This is the entire thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my lord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's actually really cool looking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like the last one to be on this gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. We'll place it here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leaving room to get to this gangway, but he's burning and that's going like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say that he is currently--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ablaze.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Facing this to there, also allowing access to both the gangplanks-- (clattering, laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was the best thing that could have happened!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Meticulous placement be damned.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone's getting Velcro in their stocking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't make them stick, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine. Liam, leave it. Leave it alone! You've lost miniature privileges.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was there too. He was there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the final moment-- we lost one of them up top, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking real D&D, people. It went better in rehearsal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. That'll do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all know-- I'm not going to touch it-- the gangplanks are open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We lost a guy on top. Wasn't there a guy on top?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's right here behind Avantika.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right. He's just out of your line of sight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. Now meticulously, carefully placed to not waste anyone's time. At that moment, you all, noticing this moment of tension, there's a flash from Caleb's hands. Figures, their eyes dart in his direction as he finishes releasing his arms and firing out of the actual deck of the ship, you see a 20-foot tall high wall of roaring flame and fire burn around in a U-shape encompassing the exterior. You can feel the heat on you, but it's not so intense as to hurt. However, I need you to roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a ten-foot reach on the outside of this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. That's 5d8 fire damage, if you don't mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the burn side?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On the outside. I choose the side, so clearly I'm not going to burn us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anyone within ten feet of the outside gets 5d8?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fucking rad. Kill some bitches.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know why I didn't expect it to be that amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shit! Bad rolls. 17 total.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine. That's a good start.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A one, a two, and a three were the first three rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a shame. Eight damage for him. For Bouldergut, that is a failure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also to toss out: the flames are opaque, so they cannot be seen through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm. 17 for Bouldergut. To the guy it got put on directly, that's a failure on his point. He takes a full 17 points of damage. The guy who's guarding the other plank there, that's a failure on him. He takes 17. Avantika fails with a natural one. Avantika takes a full 17. Then we have the guy over there. He fails with a three. He takes another 17. Then Vera rolls a natural 20. Vera's right there. Vera takes eight. Now that the Wall of Fire is in place, crackling around you, blackening the surface of the deck, the roaring of its sound as it (whooshing), roll initiative, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Advantage for Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I pre-rolled initiative for the guys here to keep it going. 25 to 20?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 20 to 15, anybody?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha has a 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have Jester and Yasha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. Beau, Jester, Yasha?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 11 for Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord at 11.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau, Jester, Yasha, Caduceus, Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ten to five?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you spell your name, Caleb? That's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so nervous! What are our names?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shoot! I'm a nine. I didn't say, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're above Caleb. Thanks for fucking up everyone's list.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry. I'm nervous, guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up first. What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can see your pulse in your neck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you? I'm dying! I might be having a heart attack! Beau reaches around, and scuffles around to Caleb and goes: Give me the notebook! I'm sticking with the plan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to grab it from him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! I'm going to grab it from you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. It's wedged into my belt. Yeah, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I look at Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is the most precarious Operation game ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Isn't it, though? That's fine. That'll work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't hold a movement, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Only an action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was taking the book an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've moved 15 feet to get over there and then your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far away is Jester from me now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester was right next to you when you started.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run back to Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's another 15 feet. That's 30 foot of your movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say: Let's get out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That finishes Beau's go. Avantika's up next.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I could have done Patient Defense! I should have done it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She can't see in here, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She cannot see, but what she can do is Control Water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeing this flames happen, she (groans), pulls back, closes her eyes for a second, and raises her scarred hand where the sphere that she unlocked Uk'otoa with raised up. At that point, the water from the ocean begins to rise--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Counterspell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It's a 4th-level spell, so I need you to roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, and it's at disadvantage. (gasps)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you get?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 14 and a 19! She fails!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She does! (cheering and laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at the veins! Oh my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was two weeks of tension being released.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Orgasms all under the table right now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holy shit! You watch as the ocean begins to swell upwards. Avantika raises her arm-- but you said the walls are opaque. Can you see through the walls?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I hear her go (arcane chanting)?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a fair point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, natural 20 and a 16, plus perception-- The lowest roll was a 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that you don't know where your perception is right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I never do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it doesn't require you to have seen the person. You know the spell's happening, you know the direction of the person. You rolled a high enough perception. I'll allow it. As you hear her chanting beneath her breath and you hear the wave rising, you glance over in the direction and you, having an instinctual affinity with flames and fire, can barely see the darkened shape of her on the opposite side of the flames being warped by the light. Using that moment, you put your hand forward and release the destructive pattern of your Counterspell. With that, the swelling ocean splatters back down to the surface.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. Now you can die happy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As that happens you hear her go, "Merde!" and she begins to back up over to here onto the side and starts shouting, "Vera!" That's going to end her turn, because that was her action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wonder how many times she can do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I remember we went to the Plank King and we took the path to get to him. How far away is the base of his mountain? His stairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you are right now? It's probably somewhere between 1200 and 1500 feet, maybe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Can I get 500 feet on the path to there with Dimension Door? I grab Beau around the waist and say: Come with me! I cast Dimension Door. Ten feet above the ground. I say: Get ready to land! So I don't land on a person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So considerate of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, this is a look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau and Jester vanish from sight in a puff of purplish-pink smoke. They both are gone. That's your action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suddenly find yourself appearing in the center of the cobblestone street, with The Bloated Cup maybe about two or three blocks up that way on the familiar path you know that you took, hooking around the side that led you to the Throne Roost.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You appear out of nowhere and there's two of them that look over in your direction, noticing you appear. That's all. That's all that happens. You still have your movement and your bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to start moving towards-- yeah? Okay. I start moving towards the Plank King.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll catch up with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. That finishes Jester's go. Yasha's up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha. What is she doing again? Wow, my brain is so scrambled.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, it's hard to think right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're down two party members in the middle of a U of flames.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. She's over here, right? Is this her? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's two hours of online research about Control Water and Wall of Fire and interactions completely mute. That is awesome.

lines.name: LIAM, MATT
lines.text: Good game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're getting the fuck out, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Yasha?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha is going to use her movement to run off. She would like to-- Is she raging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If she doesn't make an attack and isn't attacked, she loses her rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She will use her movement to head towards the side of the ship and try to exit the craft, and let's see how far we get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She scoots by the one guy who's currently-- so that'd be (counting) 35 right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 40 is her speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So she can get there. As she swings by, the one guy that's currently in the wall of fire is like, "Shit!" He glances out of the corner of his eye and sees her go by and he gets one attack of opportunity swinging at her as she streaks through the space. That's going to be a 15 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ugh, it hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. In an errant backhand swing-- she's got meaty hit points, though. That's going to be eight points of slashing damage to Yasha as she rushes past.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. She will use her bonus action to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. That will be her turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's not going to do anything with her action? She can dash with her action and move again if you're trying to get her to move.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, double dash. Yeah, I'm sorry. A little frazzled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40. What's her movement?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 40 and bonus to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As she charges past, that guard sees her running and goes, "Wait!" There's a huge distraction now. This person here who saw all of a sudden the flames erupt who was part of Avantika's crew, one of the crew members, is going to take an attack of opportunity at her as well as she runs past. She is raging, though, so she takes half damage. Ooh, that's going to be a 21 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I just saw that we are running, apparently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Yasha run past you. You look over and you watch as Beau and Jester (blink). They're gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, okay. Let's see. I'm going to follow Yasha, because that's apparently the way-- how much distance can I cover? How close to her can I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out. Movement 30 if you're rushing past her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there an easier way off or is that the easiest way off the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are three ways off the boat. There's either this gangplank, which is closer to you, this gangplank, which is further from you but generally will meet the same distance, or jumping in the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah. Whichever way gets me closer to her quickly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're such a fan of the water, though, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm learning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 30 gets you halfway on the plank there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'll take that other 30 for now, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That character does not get an attack of opportunity on you because they already used their reaction to hit Yasha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to hold there for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that finishes your turn. Now it's Fjord. Aside from Avantika, the rest of them rolled piss-poor initiative, which is to your advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Fjord is going to-- Am I standing right next to Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are currently, yes. As far as Wall of Fire goes, I'm checking the damage on that, is that at the top of their turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you asking-- Oh you're asking me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, at the end of each turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If they end their turn or the first time it hits them...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First time they enter it. Got you, okay, good to know. So if they don't leave that area--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got you. All right, cool. Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to hold Thunder Step until Nott moves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are going to begin casting Thunder Step...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But look at Nott and wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're readying it as a spell?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Readying it as a spell, yeah. The second he moves--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To trigger the instant Nott moves. You've got it. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Moves or clears the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If he moves, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes the damage again. Roll another 5d8. That is going to step into the space where the flames are no longer touching her and on the outside it's not burning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 24 that time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they don't get a saving throw by walking through it. She takes your damage. What's the damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bouldergut comes through singed. You see it as bits of her hair are curled up and red at the tips from where elements of it have turned to ember and takes a giant swing with her two-handed great club at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's going to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that is. That's a 23 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so with that, that's 15 points of bludgeoning damage. Make a constitution save.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a ten right, because it's half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's half or ten, whichever is higher. So, constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only ability checks are at disadvantage, not saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, saving throw? Well I rolled twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll one more time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (relieved cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic. She swings with her second attack. That is 19 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hits, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That-- Ooh. 17 points of damage. Another DC10, make another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's balls. That is just a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flames flicker out as your concentration is abruptly broken by the ogre that stepped through the fire wall and twice bashed-- Ford and Caleb right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All plans go wrong guys. It's okay, it's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's, you know-- We anticipated this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've still got two clerics... somewhere in the world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Bouldergut's turn. Now that comes to Nott and Vera going at the same time in the same initiative count. You have a higher dexterity than Vera, so I'm letting you go first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nott is going to stick with the plan and run towards that gangplank and get out of dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five, ten, 15. You're triggering your...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thunder Step.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thunder Step. 15. Are you going down the gangplank?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, as soon as I crest it, when I get up there, they're gone by that point, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, what do you do now? You do...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 3d10 damage and we--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In what radius?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Within ten feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It won't get anybody else. After slamming her club twice into Caleb, you're holding his shoulder as the impact is causing him to nearly crumple against you. You lift him up under the arm right as the spell finishes and (thunder crack).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18 points of thunder damage and Caleb and I will disappear and reappear 90 feet in the direction of the base of the hill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are over here. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's still on the ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a loud, heavy burst of thunder, impacts--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just me now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have 15 feet of movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I will-- Nott will continue to run down that-- Sorry, no. She gets to the top of the gangplank, she's going to turn around and nail Vera with a bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so punk rock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for an attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think it's sneak attack or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's only a 12. No, 14 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? You needed a 15. Yeah, that Mage Armor manages to deflect it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, well then I'll just keep running down the plank and then use bonus action to dash another 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does manage to get the guard as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, they're going to hit the guard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good. Going to piss that guard off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is there. You guys are all here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does the cloud remain in the sky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cloud has vanished now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so it was a one time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, I need you all to make... Here we go. It's an Ice Storm spell. Dexterity saving throw from the three of you please. If you don't mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 19 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success for you, and roll for Yasha as well if you don't mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What am I rolling?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Dexterity save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She gets advantage on those.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never seen Travis this nervous before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so flustered.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My heart is fucking racing right now. I am not okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 11 for Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Although none to you because you succeeded and you have evasion, so you take none.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that how that works? Wow, cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what rogues can do! Yeah, whenever you have to make a dex save against an effect, take half damage. If you succeed, you take no damage. If you fail, you take half. You should read your character sheet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I do fanatical focus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to do the fanatical focus once per day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you get to re-roll that. Once.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 19 plus two is 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so she only takes 11. However everything in this, for the next round, is difficult terrain as there's now giant hailstones and sleet slicked all over the rickety docks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it half movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end Vera's go. Now it comes to Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hanging over here on the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there any crates or anything around on the dock that look lift-able from Catapult?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two chests off to the side there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, if they look light enough, I will throw one up into the air at Avantika's head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for the roll on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Throw ice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's throwing one of the chests over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, one of the chests.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. I am going instead to cast Expeditious Retreat on myself and at the same time change the focus on my transmuter stone to a constitution buff. That's it. I'm going to jet back 90 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 90 feet?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn. Now it's the guards. The guards--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did that guard take damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That guard did take damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're starting to gather and they're putting up their hands like: do not flee. They're not talking yet, but you see their physicality is like, we don't know what's happening but don't you go anywhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, I wouldn't dream of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends their go. It's now Ipess' turn. As a bonus action, he's going to hide and move underneath and around the rocks to this side and he's going to pull around from the corner with his hand crossbow and take a shot at Caduceus from behind. Caduceus, what's your passive perception?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My passive perception is 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, okay. You do notice him out of the corner of your eye just barely, so he is not hidden from you. This means he does not get sneak attack damage or advantage on the attack. That is still a natural 20 on this hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is he within 30 feet of me? Wait, no! I can cast this on myself, can't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I cast-- Let me take a look really quick if I can do this. Sentinel. Can I cast Sentinel on myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What does it say? What's the wording?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As a reaction, when you or a creature you can see within 30 feet--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you or a creature?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So none of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You channel divinity to prevent the critical. It is now a regular hit. Fantastic. You take three points of piercing damage. It sticks into your shield and grinds inside and actually hits a little bit of the forearm, but you manage to deflect most of the impact and bolt gets caught in the center of there, mostly no damage to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (nervous laugh) Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the guards turns and looks towards Ipess-- Actually both of these guards turn and glance over and having this moment of not entirely certain which side to go with.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am looking irritated at the guards at this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends there. It's now the rest of the crew's turn. He's going to come to the side there, this one's going to move over to this side there, this guy's going to run across, this one's going to move over here, and this half orc's going to go and hide in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't forget our crow's nest guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them is going to be heavy crossbow to Fjord, because Fjord is still within-- Oh no, it's a 400-foot range for the next one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 400 feet?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, heavy crossbow. With 100 feet, you're going to be within the disadvantage range increment but those things are going to fire at you, Caleb. Since you're the one that's the furthest away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Caleb is not within 30 feet of me either, is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just checking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does have disadvantage on the attack though. That is a 16 and a 13 naturally.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus four, it's going to be 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My AC is 11.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, that's really low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is nine points of piercing damage to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I have nine hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you serious?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one here and this one are both going to take heavy crossbow shots. One's at Caduceus and one's at Yasha, so the most visible. Against Caduceus-- oh, man, they're rolling terrible now. That's a six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not even going to dignify that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Yasha, however, does get hit with a 17, I believe. Right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Travis? Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, sorry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 to hit, eight points reduced to four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy here has a hand crossbow. You are then in disadvantage range. He's going to take another shot at Caduceus with disadvantage. No, that's another six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He ain't going to be hitting me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of the combat round. These people, seeing all the fighting, are going to duck into their ship and hide. This team on this end, they all move out of the way but they're keeping an eye, over the side, of what's happening. Top of the combat round: Beau and Jester. You appear, Beau, in the middle of this chaos. Flames behind you. You hear a thunderous blast, that echoes from behind. You glance over, you look forward, Jester's already running in the direction. You're on the rough and tumble rock and elements of cobblestone that have long worn off and not been replaced. In front of you, a little ways up ahead, you can see the tavern.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The tavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Bloated Cup.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to go around and I want to go straight towards the Plank King.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you full run?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go: Jester, I'll see you there! I dart by, and I also want to burn a ki point to do Step of the Wind and run my full 135-foot movement towards--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I say anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say this happens at the very end of your turn. You're running, running, running, all of a sudden you stop right as they (clanking) right there in front of you. We'll pick that up next turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, man. Okay. Avantika is going to leap down off the side of the ship. Acrobatics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And slip on the ice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just difficult terrain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just kidding. Wishful thinking!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, it would increase the DC for her landing, I'll give you that. But she did roll an 18 on her acrobatics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both rapier shots, nothing. The dagger, however, that's going to be a 17 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be nine points of piercing damage and an additional eight points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uncanny dodge!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that halve both of those?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it would halve both from the attack, so take eight points of damage. You manage to push away with your momentum, the blade doesn't sink quite as deep, and you, grabbing the wrist preventing it from really coming to the hilt in your chest, you pull away. That's going to end her turn. She shouts over her shoulder and goes, "Vera, we need friends!" Jester, your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw Beauregard dart up past you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there an alley near me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you look a little bit ahead of you, around each of the buildings that are right in front of you, there are alleys that curve around that would eventually meet in the road that you guys are currently running down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anywhere where I can duck and cast Disguise Self really fast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, but you'd have to move up. You probably wouldn't be able to get to an alley to do it this turn. There are people around. There are folks that are watching all this chaos happen off in the distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to shout: Avantika is attacking people on the island! She's trying to upstage the Plank King! Everybody go see now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a deception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can the guards that I'm near hear her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a little ways up. I'll roll a perception check for them, how about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a cocked roll. The guards unfortunately do not hear it. They're not as perceptive and their focus is distracted between this, and they hear shouting, but they're not picking up the words. However, some of the folks nearby glance over at you and go, "Oh, shit, "really?" Finishes his drink real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Spread the word!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've got to go see this!" They seem less worried about their lives and more like, "Oh, I "want to go see how this goes down."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vanna's going on a prank binge!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fight, fight, fight!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, right. Is anybody around me now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not around. In front of you there's one coming out of a building and you see a couple folks that are on the front porch entrance area of the tavern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if I want to run back or help Beau!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you. What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to head back to the group. I'm going to start running towards the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Jester, you turn around and start heading back towards the group. It's a long run because you went 500 feet from the ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I'm going to duck into an alley as soon as it's near so I can cast Disguise Self on my next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha's up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Yasha's up. She is going to make two attacks against Avantika. She'll move into melee with her and will make them both reckless attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's going to use her reaction to parry, which adds a plus two to her armor class.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 17 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That misses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take her head off, Yasha!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of damage to Avantika. As the blade carves through, she tries to parry it with the rapier, but it slips down and carves a slight bit off of her forearm before it gleans off, and you can see a little bit of red immediately exposed where the cloth was carved through, and a little bit of the skin and flesh removed with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She will use the rest of her movement to keep running up the dock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as she can get.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, because it's fucking shitty terrain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Difficult terrain, yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does she have anything that keeps her from--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dealing with that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like angel of death problem? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As an action you can angel of death.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wings on ice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're more for the surprise party factor than the actual flight thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, I don't see anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that finishes Yasha's go. Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, man, wow, I am really stuck on that, aren't I? That's irritating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika does not have a reaction; she already used it to parry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's difficult terrain, though, so if I burn my action I'm only going to get 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hmm. Let's get weird. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's! Let's do it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get weird, Taliesin, get weird!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to make all the ice turn into bugs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to vanish. That's the first thing I'm going to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say for the purposes of keeping tabs on you, this will be your marker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, cool marker!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See-through Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a joke there that I cannot think of what it is because I'm too freaked out. I can cast while I'm invisible, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's your ability. As soon as you cast something, you lose your invisibility.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, the invisibility only lasts one round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, let me check the wording on that, if it's different from the actual spell, because usually it's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not a big deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This encounter's getting to me. My body is radiating heat. I'm hot everywhere. Flames! On the side of my face!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can magically turn invisible until the start of your next turn or until you attack, make "a damage roll, or force someone to make a saving throw." You can cast a spell as long as it doesn't damage or attack somebody.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as it's not a damage spell, I can just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or force someone to make a saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, okay. Yeah, I'll just ignore that, then. I'll stay invisible and I'm going to try and take my 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be 30 feet with this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, my 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I get one further away, just to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go at an angle in front of Yasha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, just to get a little cover. Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your go, Caduceus. Fjord, you're up. Your friends are catching up behind you, there's a sleet storm slamming, there's guards swarming around your direction telling you to halt, and up ahead of you you watched a speedy Caleb grind into the ground. What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to get weird, right? All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Getting weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll look up and point above the stern of the ship where Vera is, and my eyes will roll back and I'll say: (deep voice) Barlgura, and I will Summon Greater Demon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to drop a barlgura right on Vera's fucking head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was a sick description!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have never been so proud.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was like Babe Ruth summoning a demon from hell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I wasn't sure if you had taken this spell. I prepared for it just in case.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is it!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bouldergut has met her love. They start making out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd be just on the edge of the ship there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's great. I want him right in their fucking business.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you walk away, does he stay there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I only command him for one round, and on that command I will say: Fuck up that crew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the dark speech that emanates from inside of Fjord's body, it echoes out like a weird, discordant harmony of several voices you've never heard. For those that are present. You guys are way the fuck away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck up that crew, fuck up that crew, fuck up that crew!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the sound of reality cracking and you look up and watch where, in the center of the sky there, at the very edge of The Squalleater's deck, two large, meaty hands pull open this barrier between the realms, and stepping out you see this large, gorilla-like demon covered in fur and horns at the edge, these giant fists, with tusks that emerge from beneath this chin and these red, burning, coal-like eyes. As it steps out, it turns right towards Vera, whose eyes are wide, and (roars) in her face. You watch her hair get blown back a bit, spittle across her chin. That's your action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my bonus action I'll turn to the guards and go: Avantika's not to be trusted. I will Misty Step with my bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you manage to Misty Step.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 30 feet. Towards the direction of out. The fuck out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This puts you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anywhere near Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 60 feet from Caleb at this point. I was 90 feet from Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You went 30 feet forward and you still have your movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use the rest of my-- yeah I knew that, I'm planning for that, yeah. I'll use the rest of my 30 feet to run towards that unconscious wizard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you go heading towards Caleb. After shouting, "Avantika's not to be trusted" after summoning a fucking demon, I'm going to ask you to make a persuasion check with disadvantage. Because you just summoned a fucking demon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Creepily. Very creepily.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're coming upon the group of guards now that are around the rest of the crew of the Mistake, but they've forgotten about that crew at that point. They saw Caleb rush past. Two of them went over to figure out what the hell happened as he basically darted-- football fumbled off to the side. The others are turning and coming towards your direction, but it's not their turn yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes your go, Fjord. It is now Bouldergut's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I roll initiative for the barlgura?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's a 17 plus-- I don't know if there's any bonus. Maybe it's a 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dex bonus?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dex plus two. So 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, right after Avantika.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Good puppy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (nervous laughter and noises)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Bane impression) Your punishment will be more severe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't get to go as soon as you summon it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't-- It says it gets its own initiative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That's real interesting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh huh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is fucking chaos.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Bouldergut's going to move. (counting) I'm going to make a saving throw for the now partially-damaged-- okay, yeah, that's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The plank?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's weirdness from all sides. It seems the watch are not used to this chaos breaking this far in towards Darktow. Usually, the reef and the defenses they built around the reef are enough to keep things like this far from the island. That finishes Bouldergut's turn. That brings us to Nott and Vera, but Nott, you get to go first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will run full speed through the difficult terrain. How far can I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You're next to Yasha with your movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Then bonus, another--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 25, 30.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now I'm right in front of these guards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, and you still have your bonus action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I used movement and bonus action to move, and I'll use action to-- (whispering) shit, who do I fuck up? (laughter) There's no one engaged with anyone, so there's no one I can do sneak attack to. Instead, I'll do a Hail Mary. I'll take out a bit of fleece, and rub it, and speak some words, and cast Phantasmal Force on Avantika.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She'll probably save, but it's worth a shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the save?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 14. Intelligence. She's smart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll low, roll low.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh! What's her modifier though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's very good at a few things, but she doesn't have the highest intelligence to get to that point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's smart, but not that smart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She went to public school!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I went to public school.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We all have average intelligence, let's be real.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As Bouldergut is walking over, holding a pick, or what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a giant-- it looks like it once was a mast of a ship that's been whittled down into a greatclub.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want Avantika to see Bouldergut doing this and holding up the book. Holding up the book and waving it around. She's definitely holding that book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. Avantika glances over and (sigh). For a moment, you see a look of relief come over Avantika's face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Is that your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Now, it's Vera's turn. Vera, seeing this happen-- Oh man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But she believes it now. How long does she believe it for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anything that keeps her occupied for one round, but still.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay. A lot can happen in 60 seconds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vera's going to glance off to the side-- Actually, she's going to try to move out of melee of this barlgura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, make a strike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. That is only a nine. Wait, that's a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine misses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the giant demon swings outward, it impacts and deflects off the energy field of Mage Armor that pushes it off to the side. Vera steps back. The reach on that is five foot, right? For the attack? Just making sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, five feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just barely from that angle there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that does it. All right, she goes, after hearing what Avantika said, goes, "Everyone, "they have crossed Darktow! Take them to the Plank King!" You watch as she's saying these words, her hand sends this strange series of symbols through, and casts Mass Suggestion on the guards in the vicinity of 60 feet of her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mass? Mass Suggestion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's new for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Being taken to the Plank King ain't bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do they even know who the Plank King is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of them failed. You watch as all of these guards have the confusion suddenly crystalizes, and all of them look towards your group and start shouting, "Stop them! They're thieves!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck. (stammers) We're thieves?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They all failed their save. He thinks that we're the bad guys now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vera, after casting that, is going to use the rest of her movement. (counting) Oh, god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's dead. Oh, no, she passed out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll put her there, it's fine. All right, that ends Vera's turn. Caleb, for your turn, make a death save. It's the beginning of your round. I keep forgetting it's the beginning of your turn, in case you roll a natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is-- these dice-- That's a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. That's one success.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Deez dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of Vera's turn, this goes away.

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, which sucks for us, and now they can get to us faster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sleet and stuff has now melted and dripped off the sides. These guards here--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (guard impression) "What's all this, then?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 30 on each side, and they're both going to attempt to grapple Yasha. Go ahead and make an athletics check for her. She has advantage because she is raging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. That's 24. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, one guy fails to grapple. Then the other guy's going to attempt to-- Make another check. She has to beat a 16.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12, and that's a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they just can't-- they try and grab her, and she shrugs them off, no problem. These other guards here begin to swarm up to try and grab Nott. This one's going to move up and try and grab Yasha. This one here is going to-- He tries to move forward towards Yasha, and ends up chest-bumping space in the middle of the air, and confusedly is going to try and grapple whatever's there. He has disadvantage on that, so first, I'm going to do that with you. Rolled really well with disadvantage, natural 19 and a natural 17. Make an acrobatics or athletics check to see if he doesn't grapple you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Acrobatics or athletics? Those are both terrible, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a big thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a 19 plus one, so I'm going to do an acrobatics run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am, to be fair, invisible. It's hard to grab.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no, no! He tries to grab you, and he gets ahold of you, and you push him off, and he looks really confused. He grabbed something before he really knew what was happening, and is really confused. For a moment, he thinks it was a ghost.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing but sparkle pony fur.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the one that rushed up to try to grab Yasha again because the other guys failed, ooh, natural 18. So, roll for her. It's going to be a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is currently grappled by this guy. He's now grabbed and is holding her in place. She's (grunting). The two other guys are going to try to dogpile in to try to stop her from moving. We have three attempting to grapple you, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're tiny. You're dexy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure. Here we go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Slippy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so first guy--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do they roll? Do I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You roll an acrobatics check against them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a success. Next guy, natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 22.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (surprised laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What the fuck is happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, my god. All right, all right. So, he manages to actually grab-- The first one, you're just too slippery. "Oh, god!" You turn on the side. The other guy grabs you. Right as he squeezes, you just jump out of it, land on his arms, and then step off. The third one's going to try and grab you. That's a six. Go and roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ipess is going to (counting) try to hide at the top of it. Ooh, natural 20. So, he's going to scoot up around the side, dart off the edge. He's going to make a shot at the barlgura, who has shown up. With advantage, that is going to be a 19 to hit. What's its armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He does get sneak attack damage against it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an additional 2d6, so...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does this thing have a name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Barlgura. It has a demon name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which is what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of piercing damage. Does it have any resistances?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does. It has damage resistance to cold, fire, and lightning. Damage immunity to poison... yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damage immunity to poison. That's all?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Condition immunities: poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. No immunities to non-magical weapons?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, just making sure. All right, yeah, so it takes full damage on that. Mark that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 14, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That's going to end Ipess's turn. Now it's the crew's turn. This one's going to make a step back, trying to get out of range of the barlgura. It already used its reaction to do an attack. It's going to reload and fire with its crossbow against it. Ooh, that's going to be a 17 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 17 hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It suffers eight points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These guys here are going to fire down after reloading. They're now focusing on the giant demon. They're not focusing on you guys, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're turning like, "Oh, Jesus!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are tanking. This is a tank. This is a good tank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's (counting) six shots against the barlgura.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six shots. Oh, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, all right. 18 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One point of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Oh, no, misses, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Seven to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses. Three more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last one is 14 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses. Yeah, misses. Armor class 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes the crew's go as they're all laying into this demon that appeared on there. You watch as (growl) as it turns back to yell, all of a sudden it gets another bolt in the chest and in the side. It's getting all of these bolts that are now sticking out of its body as it's raging angrily on the deck of the ship. You can see now there's a giant, burned U on the side. It wasn't around long enough to catch the ship on fire, but there is a dark scarring on the base of the deck there. All right. One more round, and it would've caught fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: FYI, if I'd stayed conscious, I would've thrown a Fireball at that boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) That would've been great!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was my next move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, man. All right, that ends. Top of the round. All right, so, Beau. The guards are there in front of you right now. There's three of them shoulder to shoulder, and there's one of them that looks-- the one in the center is a little better-armored. They go, "Hey, Miss, Miss, where "are you going?" They're looking at you and both looking at what's over there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a coup. She's trying to take over the city with a demon god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not deception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because it's honest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Persuasion's not my best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was nothing about that statement that was incorrect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! 13? Above average?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure if he believes you, but he's not aggressive, if that makes sense. He goes, "Well, be that as it may, we need to figure out what's happening before we can have you running so "quickly with intent."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Time is of the essence. They're killing pirates who do not bend the knee to her. I've got to get to him now. Let me pass!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll send for him. Stay here," and the two other guards stay there, and hold the position and fill in the space. He turns around and starts making his way towards the Throne Roost.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me come with you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Ah! I've got it," and he continues walking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill the guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say that you've used an action at this point. You still have your bonus and your movement, if you want to use it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bathe in their blood. No, no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you. You can go along with it and stay there and wait for your friends, or anything else you want to try. They are not aggressive at this point; they're just holding the line.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got a big stick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do not attack them!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam Riegel, shut the fuck up!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: wait.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tension in your body is rising up, and for a second, the muscles bulge and the veins begin to pop from the sheer amount of adrenaline that's in your system and your urge to charge through. You just breathe heavily as your entire form sinks into it. The two guards, you can see their tension, as their hands were going for a weapon, drop. They both go into a watching but waiting pose. That ends your go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With great power.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now Avantika's turn. Avantika sees the guards shifting their allegiance under the effect of this Mass Suggestion spell. She's going to turn and attempt to go after Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm angry at the villain; that's what I'm supposed to be!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're doing great, everything is fantastic, I'm having a wonderful time!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm having a wonderful time!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My ears are going to combust!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. She's making three strikes against her, because she's the one closest to it. Yeah, she's not too hurt. She's not doing anything defensively. Or, you know what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so tempting. I'm so tempted to just bust through there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's so in character.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Yasha's being held. As far as she knows, Yasha is doing okay, or the guards have her. Nott is the one that keeps darting around, so she's going to raise a hand and cast Eldritch Blast at Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eldritch Blast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, that's 24 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take three points of force damage. As you're jumping off, suddenly you get hit across the chin, but it's a glancing blow and your world goes a little dizzy for a second. The second one misses entirely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said three points, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Okay. That's not as bad as I was preparing for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She didn't roll very good on the damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does a grapple count towards keeping rage up? Is it an attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's going to use her movement to back up five, six, going towards this, backing up towards the ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She was not in melee with Yasha, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's the barlgura's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is. The barlgura is going to use its running leap to jump right on Vera.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh-ho-ho!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It will unleash three attacks, one with its bite and two with its fists, and they will all be reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it can do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. Roll damage on that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, and I'm throwing shit, no problem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bling! Bling, bling, bling!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 12 points of piercing damage for the bite.

There's, I believe at this point, four of them that were heading your direction, because there was the one that was going towards Caleb. So we'll say two of them you'll have to push past. They both are going to make attacks of opportunity on you. Just an attempt to grapple to stop.

All right, that ends your turn? Vera is looking not too great. Vera is going to--

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Concentration spell's lost.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But their compulsion's no longer there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They saw the Fireball go over their heads, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. With that, the spell fades. Vera crumbles to the ground, barlgura's gone, giant explosion. The mast leans slightly to one side from the impact. This guy was out of the radius, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Still have to make a dex save from it, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say if he hit the mast-- I'd say it hit him, actually, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: His poor feet. He's like, "Fuck!"

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Ipess does make it. I need you to make a wisdom saving throw, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm sure it's going to fail. This is a wisdom? 18.

lines.text: As you go conscious, you watch as bodies go flying off the side and fall limp to the side of the dock, their bodies still smoldering but unmoving. You start flashing back to a very painful memory, and Caleb's eyes glaze over. You are currently stunned.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Damn.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: Ipess looks around at the destroyed crew, saw Vera go down, and runs up to try and see how she's doing. The remaining crew, which is just the one here, and this one here.

lines.text: Bouldergut's still alive, barely. Barely.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: There was no variation in that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool.

lines.text: I tell the guards standing next to me, because I'm assuming they saw the explosion of the Fireball, I'm going to say: More people die with each passing moment. Will you at least walk with me? Time is of the essence here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't do anything funny." They turn around and start walking with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good deal. Yes, yes, yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I power walk like a grandma at a mall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're (grunting), trying to keep up a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those sweet all-white New Balance.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Avantika takes a quick glance at the scenario, and opens the hatch and charges inside of her ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, unless anyone's going to resist, combat comes to an end and we are now at a role playing point. At that moment, we'll take a break. Unless you were doing anything?

lines.text: Are you resisting?

lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both going to attempt to grapple you and stop you. Make two acrobatics checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not great. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both fail, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, they both got me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that was a 12 and an 18.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who are these guards? I wasn't next to anybody!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This was as you were charging through there, and on their turn they moved up to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're really dextrous.

lines.name: MATT
