lines.text: We'll say that happened on their turn, so on the beginning of your turn, you're grappled. You can attempt to break free if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, that's an interesting point. Let me pull up my new, fancy Player's Handbook.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's their new limited edition.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a box set. It's so fucking hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unintentional commercial, but these are so awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, it's too pretty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think they're brick-and-mortar only, so you've got to go to actual game stores.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go to your local game stores. Support small businesses!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll see me at a game store. I don't know which one, but I'll be there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A thousand years of D&D!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When are you going to be rich, son?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: D&D. &D.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't say. I'll say make a check and we'll see if it's high enough for each of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not. It's a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. They hold tight, you can't move. Your movement's zero. They're both clutching you there on the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) I relent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. With the chaos now coming to a stop, and Nott prevented from escaping, though that would have been a fun chase sequence, now we'll go to a break.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, we have played this game for hundreds of hours together. That was two of the best hours of this game ever! That was so much fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Man, that was really intense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we turn it on its head for you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, there was a few things there that went differently than I expected!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was having so much Treasure Island flashes. That's one of my favorite books, and it's like all of this is so good! All of it's so good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we go to the break, we have our fantastic giveaway from our friends at Wyrmwood, who are giving away this leather-inset zebrawood dice tray.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the one I got. It's so pretty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome back. Before we go in, we have our winner of our fantastic Wyrmwood dice tray, zebrawood dice tray. The winner is WonderfulMouse. Congratulations, WonderfulMouse! We'll get that sent to you ASAP.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything is held in place. You're making your way to the guards. What are you doing, Jester? You see Beau being led up by the guards towards the Throne Roost.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, you can do it, Beau. Do I see the big fire explosion too, as it happens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, you saw and heard the distant (explosion).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whitestone saw the fire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Whitestone saw the fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Okay. I hope everyone's okay. Please, Traveler, be with them. I'm going to start running towards the docks in disguise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The guards have now pulled you all to your feet, and have begun to apply manacles to your hands. Not anything too aggressive, but for the purpose of safety and to maintain the order within this community, they're particular and careful. They also go onto the deck, and you see them beginning to collect the bodies of those that were killed. Bouldergut is inconsolable and furious, and it takes a few guards to get her to calm down. Avantika is having a conversation with a couple of the guards. You guys are being pulled away from the docks, towards the city. As you are brought towards the edge of it, one of the guards, adorned a little better than the rest, have a brief discussion. You overhear one of them say, "Hold tight, apparently someone's going to get the "Plank King." While you guys are all waiting, and you're going to convene with the rest of your troupe--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not going to join them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But go and find the vicinity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See what's going on, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see that people are excited, and worried, and making up their own stories, and what they saw. One of them is like, "It was crazy! A demon "fell from the sky and slammed into the boat and it was intense!" The rumors are going crazy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was a Gwar concert.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 7th-level spell, Summon Gwar Concert.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (old man voice) Did Avantika finally do it? Did she finally do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's still trying?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I always heard that she was going to stage a coup. Did she finally stage one? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I can take ten minutes of this time sitting manacled to cast Prayer-- if enough of us are within 30 feet of each other right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, as soon as you begin to make any physical action towards spellcasting--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all vocal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's only verbal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's only verbal. And I tell them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You tell them you're going to cast a spell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be healing everybody. It's a thing that I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No spellcasting."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (loud sigh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't want any funny stuff."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, that's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have they taken our weapons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have, after manacling, taken your weapons. The individuals are carrying them at their side. Not yours. They couldn't find yours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wonder why.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have your crossbow, and they've taken your shield and your staff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I within range of everybody? Could I be in the crowd, but near everyone? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a small perimeter being held, but you could get probably within 20, 25 feet or so of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then, if I'm within 30 feet, I'm going to cast Prayer of Healing on my buds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? On your buds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On my buddies!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a performance check to see how subtly you can-- no, this would be deception. Make a deception.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A deception check. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight. Well, I hope those people are going to be okay. They look like they're pretty hurt up in there. Some of them look like they're bloody. That one looks burned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to subtly try and sneak your verbal components of your spell into the discussion, one of the guards goes: "Hey! Sorry, we're making sure there's no casting this close to "it, if you don't mind."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Makes sense. I just saw some were hurt. I was trying to help out, but if they don't want it, then I ain't going to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's best not to get involved. Terribly sorry about that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to hear more!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nah, that's it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! It was so good!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is what you get for Counterspell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't worry. We're taking care of it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just a cheek caress, then gone. Not even a kiss goodnight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, about 30 or so minutes pass for the rest of you. As make your way up the steps now, trying to jaunt, you manage to catch up to the armored fellow, who now acts as the tip of the spear, essentially. Now you're flanked and to the front, although the flanking has to shift as the space for the steps ascending to the Throne Roost get only wide for one person at a time. You are being held at that point. You make your way up to the Throne Roost, to the shelf of stone. There you see, standing at the edge, is the Plank King himself, blackened curls still dangling around his massive goliath head, his long coat billowing slightly with the bit of wind that's whipping around the side of the cliff face. The morning fog is burning off of the nearby reefs, and you can see a little bit further out. The sky itself is still dull gray. Looks over and goes, "That was "quite the display, wouldn't you say?" The guard goes, "Right, sir. One of them, we found at least "someone running from the bit who says they have information for you." He goes, "Oh yeah, no, I "recognize this one. Step forward."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'Sup?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So what's all this?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, the display you just saw, or this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you don't mind, tell me what's going on."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I toss him the book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He flips through the pages. "This is gibberish."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She has been worshipping an outer-worldly being called Uk'otoa, left over from the Betrayer Gods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He glances through the paperwork, looks at you giving him this sly grin, and goes, "You, "newcomer into these waters, spent less than a day amongst our people and have already attacked and "stolen from one of our own, as well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't attack; she attacked us first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we'll see what she has to say to defend herself, as well. Hang tight with me here, "with these men. The rest of you, get the rest of your guard. Bring her friends, and bring Avantika "and who else had survived that massacre up here to the roost."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to trust the things that she says? You'll see a U burned into the deck of the ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't trust anyone, and I trust more those that I've mistrusted for years than those "I've only come to mistrust and know right now. So we'll see where it all lies. Be patient. If what "you say is true, then we've got all time in the day."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have time to read that book right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't read a fucking piece of this, but I've got a few friends who are more of a "page-turning type."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, you came to me, though. Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because I wanted to see if you'd actually do something. Remember, we don't turn on pirates here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do I get when I'm right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you're right, then I'll judge you based on the fact that you broke our law as soon as you "got here, and I'll weigh it versus how positive this tells me. There's not enough, well, maybe you "and Avantika will find yourselves out there on a pike of warning."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about we strike a deal right now? Because when you go down there, you're going to see murdered crew mates and a U burned into the deck of that ship from where she was trying to summon Uk'otoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) You crazy motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He nods a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So if you think you can trust anything that she says before you get into the details of that book, details that we've already deciphered, as we've been on the seas with her for quite some time, and the betrayal that we have seen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So's this one." He snaps his fingers, and you see a cloaked figure step out of the shadows, the same cloak that passed you on the stairs the night before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it Jamedi?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Jamedi, hood pulled back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he with us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like Jamedi.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jamedi does not like her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the Plank King steps up towards you, now looming over you, a good two and a half feet of height on you. This imposing presence, wide like a mountain, glancing down at you with a grin. You can smell his early morning breath of rotting teeth and whatever he had the night before pulsing from his grin. He goes, "I have to say, for someone so small, you've got some "serious balls."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks. That's not the first time I've heard that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And if you survive, I'm sure it won't be the last. All right. Let's go see your friends."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey! I want a boat, and safe passage out if we're correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If this is right, let's hope you didn't blow up too much of her boat; it'll be yours."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If it's enough."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god. (choking)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards now turn and spin you around and push you back down the stairs as the Plank King follows behind, Jamedi keeping a close watch. He goes and shouts something off to the side. He goes, "Solon! I'm going to need your brain for this one. Come on." You hear a voice go, "All "right, I'm coming."

lines.name: LIAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Solon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Solon. S-O-L-O-N. Coming around the corner, you see a human man, probably in his late 50s, early 60s. Bit of an unkept puff of a chin goatee, his hair thinning in this big widow's peak, gray to white. These big spectacles around his eyes, and this tattered, thin mustache that's attempted to be curled into a handlebar, but it seems to have split in places and is not very well kept. He has this big, green cloak that's wrapped around his shoulders that is so much material and billowing so widely, it makes his head comparatively look much smaller. He's clutching a bag, and he's getting his stuff. "Wait here, I'm getting my stuff. Ugh!" They keep walking, and eventually you see him trying to catch up from behind. (panting) You take it this was probably what the Plank King was referring to as his bookish friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You think?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's the fighter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are all patiently waiting here, looking amongst yourselves, is there anything you wish to do, or are you succumbing to the hope that Jester, Beauregard, and/or possibly the Plank King comes to situate this? Eventually, you see Avantika brought up from the ship in manacles, as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I've noticed that they're not letting any of us cast anything, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they shut that down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then no. I would do Mage Armor, but no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is basically a short rest? Is this what this is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not quite long enough to be a short rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Motherfucker.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, I was going to say the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you know what? No, it's about an hour of short rest. I give that to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bless you, Mercer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the travel of Beau to the front, and the rest of the guard to get there; for the Plank King conversation; for him to descend the Throne Roost to make his way through the city to the docks; yeah, that's over an hour.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then in these circumstances, I would dismiss Frumpkin from the Material Plane and bring him back on my shoulder, so he's with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As Frumpkin appears on the shoulder, one of the watch goes, "Oh, where'd you come from, "little one? Didn't even see you come in." Begins scritching Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's friendly. That's my pet cat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wonder what ship you came aboard?" (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm thinking really bad thoughts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently a few of you fleeing into the city. You know I have my misgivings about trusting anyone, "but I'm far more likely to toss in with those that I've mistrusted long enough to at least know where "they stand. I don't know a fucking bit about all of you. So my other friend--" and he points towards Jamedi, who's now in the back, and the rest of you see, "-- says that you've all come in "with her lot naught but maybe two weeks back, and that not most of you have much of an experience on "the sea, naught but one. The rest of you still haven't quite found your legs on the waters. I'm "going to ask you right now, what brought you out there, to mucking with the pirates' deals? Speak up!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We understand your distrust. We are new here, and we only beg your patience as we prove ourselves before you. Avantika and her crew were up to foul deeds. Our friend Beau here, I trust, has shown you her journal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches back in his pocket and goes, "Oh, right. Here," and gives it to Solon, who goes, "Oh, all right. This is not a language I really know--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a cipher in the front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, yeah."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's wedged into the back page.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, fuck me, this is--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's pretty good work, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sir, with all due respect, it's going to take me a long while to do this. This is elaborate."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I told you, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think there's already some work that can be checked, if that speeds it up. I mean, that should be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Plank King goes, "Shh."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You said there's some special parts here, of looking to overturn me or something? What pages "are that at?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is near the end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's our Solon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Solon goes, "Oh! I'd very much like to have a conversation with you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As you will, if that is welcome here, but yeah. The bit about her being a traitor to the Plank King, and wanting to rule over the entire sea, and have the Plank King-- I believe the words are, if I remember correctly, because my memory is spotty, "bend the knee."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You point out the space where that was.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is near the end, ja, right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thumbs through, and he goes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's complex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're starting to fog a bit. He goes, (clears throat), plops down, and starts going through, and pulls out paper and a quill. He sets up in the middle of the dock area and starts going through and point-by-point deciphering and translating each part of the cipher over to one of his empty pages.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great king, if we may, time we have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That we do."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's at your whim that we serve. I think it would be only fair to ask that we remain under guard while your compatriot here translates that text.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, we're standing right here."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What brought you to these waters? Why'd you throw "in with her lot?" You see now, they're bringing Avantika forward with the rest of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We decided to investigate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where does your allegiance lie?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My allegiance is completely separate and isolated from any persons here. My allegiance is with the Cobalt Soul.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say with advantage because you did drop the Cobalt Soul. In particular with the Plank King, that has meaning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to read her as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Plank King nods and goes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My voice is shaking. I'm so nervous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 22 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you barely see through. There's a hint of truth, and there's a hint of not so true. It's a half-truth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb sees it! Go away, Fjord! Go away!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mixed lies or half-truths.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Plank King nods and goes, "Ah, the Archives. I've had some dealings."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hmm. So you have your library card?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've taken a number of my things, damaged my "ship, and they're trying to smear my name. One who has walked alongside you and all of you fine, fine "folks for the past ten years! Even using the memory of Vandren against me." You hear a few voices go like, (murmuring) "Vandren." "Vandren raised this one and he sabotaged his ship. Blew it "asunder in the middle of the ocean. That was the last he was seen. He's already killed one of our "own. Is this untrue?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (stuttering) Is she talking to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From the crowd, I'm going to go: She's lying! We always knew she had it in for the Plank King!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Someone goes, "Shh!" All eyes are on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plank King, if I may. My ears, though pointy, can only stand a certain amount of dishonesty. I would prefer to cut through the bull. There are those of us among us who can make sure that the truth is spoken here. I would beg of you to allow that to happen now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Plank King gives you this very severe look. His eyes narrowed and glancing you up and down, almost piercing you with but a glance. He raises his hand with a grin and goes, "Oh. What's "necessary for such a thing?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) Who has that shit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do and Jester does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It takes me literally punching the shit out of Avantika though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Honorable Plank King, the means justify the ends. My compatriot here will place her Cobalt knuckles upon the chin of Avantika and you will hear the truth. You need but only ask your questions again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be my guest." Avantika is like, "What is--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before she-- (double punch) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's manacled and being held by two guards from behind. It's auto-hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go for the temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have a ki point left?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: More or less. All but one. Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's the DC on that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Features and traits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, whatever your DC is for all of your monk stuff.

lines.name: LIAM, SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) Monk stuff!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's a wisdom save. No. That's a natural eight plus four. 12. So all these different hits and pressure points are hit, like under the chin, that area. Another to the sternum and another that clocks the temple. And Avantika just, "Ugh!" (heavy breathing)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They are unable to speak a deliberate lie for one minute and all charisma checks have advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Intimidation checks? Oh, charisma checks! Yeah, persuasion, everything else. That's right, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mein Gott.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make sure you tell the Plank King it's a limited time engagement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's like: "Ugh!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have 60 seconds, but I have more knuckles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Plank King steps forward. "Avantika, is what they're saying true?" She goes, (frustrated grunt) Glances aside. Doesn't respond. He leans forward closer. "Tell me."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Silence speaks volumes, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is what they're saying true? Is that book containing passages where you're looking to take "this island for yourself?" Her eyes look away. She just looks down at the rest of the dock. He leans in real close, pushing his forehead almost to hers. "Look me in the eye, woman."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She just doesn't meet his gaze. "Hmm. By the power of The Revelry that surrounds me, let this "be a lesson to those who would work against the words we swore to each other on this land. May "your memory be besmirched for the few days it's recalled." He reaches forward and grabs Avantika by the throat and lifts her up and she's fighting against it. He lifts her and looks at her. "I hope "your sea god, whatever it is, is very merciful on the other side." (cracking) He breaks her neck with one hand. Her body goes limp in his grasp and he throws it to the docks. "Don't worry about the "cipher." Solon goes, "It's actually quite interesting. I'd like to continue." "Fine."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I worked through the night on that. It's very interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And it's really well done! I'm honestly very taken aback by it. Your penmanship is quite "good as well."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Breakfast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a sample of her penmanship here if you want to see some more of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So hear my judgment upon these folk. You are hereby banished from Darktow. Take the remnants of "the Squalleater as your own. Take whatever--" He looks over towards the rest of the crew you hired, who are like (panicked panting).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) Those poor fuckers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have had a terrible few weeks here! Except for Orly, who's sitting there, smoking a pipe, and his one eye goes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stone-cold killer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He is so stoned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Take the ship you've thereby damaged. Limp your way beyond the reefs. We're going to burn the "colors of that ship. Should you ever return to the outskirts of the Dragshallow, we won't hesitate "but sink you to the depths below."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is beyond a generous sentence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unshackle them. This stands immediately. I hope you have enough supplies in that boat to last "you the rest of the journey."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) I don't think that we do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll be fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll make do. We will leave with great haste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Tell the Archives that the Plank King sends his regards."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will do, good sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now fucking go!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before everybody gets on the boat, can I run over to the docks because I'm not shackled, and I try to find the jewels that I dumped off the docks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You have to dive into the water to do so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you jump into the water. Make an investigation-- No, this'll be a perception check with disa-fucking-vantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Disa-fucking-vantage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, fuck you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two ones!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You counterbalanced the rest of this game!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fucking belly flop into the water!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sin eater!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two ones in a roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Has that happened since the walk of shame?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two years ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend the next five or so minutes scrounging through silt and muck and barnacles and gathered bits of kelp and various other underwater plant life that has rooted itself among the rocks here. You've scraped your fingers, they're bleeding from digging through. You find a cluster of these gems that you dropped and you climb up out of the freezing water and find one of the nearby ladders and come up. Looking at your quarry, it is a bunch of rocks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on, Jester, let's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh you don't see Jester. You just see an old prospector come up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're a prospector!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These are beautiful rocks. Beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your crew is ushered to the Squalleater.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! The Mist is gone? The Mistake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Mistake is still in repairs and at this point has been left behind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, we will take the bigger boat!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Avantika's crew are still manacled up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The remained of them, yes. Bouldergut is heavily manacled and is currently guarded by seven different guards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we try to take them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Maybe one or two of them. Ipess?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? They're going to hate us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? We've got to have somebody to kill while we're at sea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we have our crew.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have our crew. We do not need them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we've got a way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we know how to sail now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Better. Yeah, and they do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys get on the ship with your crew, the ship is damaged, the sails are damaged, one of the masts is damaged. It's going to need some repairs for it to be fully functional. But you have to leave now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see them at the ready, keeping a very close eye on your exit as you slowly walk of shame yourselves out of the purview of the Plank King and to a very carefully earned freedom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I may, who is really good at finding shit? You two, and anyone--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like investigation style?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. How about you three, into Avantika's quarters and turn it upside down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, you are turning me on right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not my intention, but go ahead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just in case she booby trapped this ship, search the hull, search her quarters, search everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, check for traps first, okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll be doing that at disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and calm the crew a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll point out that we're-- this is all good. We got away from the pirates, everything's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a general persuasion check for me. Just a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you do. A number of the crew that you hired, some of them look like they're a little scarred from the experience, but you managed to calm them down. They seem very thankful that you've pulled them-- you brought them into this mess, but you pulled them out of it and there's something to that. Some of them begin to get back to work, begin to repair some of the aspects of the ship. Man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is Jester able to mend some of those damaged--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything that's small enough, I'm going to try to mend. Small holes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20 percent of the damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The downside of the Fireball. The Fireball and the-- actually. It was a 20-foot tall Wall of Fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, but the upside was so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then you singed the other sails, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's a lot of sail-- you have--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That didn't last more than two rounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, but that's a very intense--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say comparatively, you're limping on one full mast of functionality, and the rest of the sails are partially damaged.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gasps) (pigeon coos) Paint on the mast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (pigeon coo) I was thinking about it, but it's a lot of the use of the paint because--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (pigeon coo) How about a few sails?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have to pigeon this. I mean, we know what you can do, so maybe paint the fix for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just so you know--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I want. I don't want to paint the whole thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How big are the holes? Are they giant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're beyond Mending.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mending can do little tears and things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm not talking Mending, I'm talking how big are the holes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the ones that are damaged, the sails are mostly destroyed. They caught fire and burned.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a question. If I finally go to bed for like 14 hours-- Minor Alchemy for a transmutation wizard. I am able to perform an alchemical procedure on one object composed entirely of wood, stone, iron, copper, silver, and transform it into another material. If there was damage to the mast, would I be able to shove other things in there and turn it to wood? That seems like too much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't quite work that way, and it's temporary. It's more--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a spell that I could've done, but I didn't take that spell. I chose Counterspell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be fair, I think that worked in your favor. If tonight has proved anything, if the end of the last campaign has proved anything, Counterspell's always a good choice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to spend a day moving slowly, but I think we're going to slowly figure out how, between all of us, we can repair this, and I'm sure we can figure out where to get some cloth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This just turned into a resource management game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it's a lot different kind of game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The open sky that you enjoyed on your way to Darktow has now become-- not a storm front by any means, but definitely cloudier skies. As you're heading outside, you can see Yasha smelling the air and be like, "This might be getting close to "storm weather."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a good thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She smiles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a good thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continuing past into that space, repairs are being done best you can, with the ship still limping along. You make your way out of the Dragshallow Reef, out into open waters, and the ocean is yours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I find Orly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll bring out the map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bring out the map.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have it near me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we get close to a port or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or an island where we--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we know where the map is, please?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Bring out the map!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's usually right there. It got moved for Honey Heist, that's why. Oh, is it down there? Oh, there it is! It got hidden! It got moved from me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it, Bobby!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damn it, Bobby. There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I sell falchions and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm having an adrenaline crash now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we survived and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are those little zoomy magnifying glasses?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're magnifying, Matt? Where'd you get those?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The crew got them. That was Max. Thanks, producer Max!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we know if we are making our way--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have just managed to make your way out of here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, going the wrong way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we're going right into her vagina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that is the Wildmother. She is nature, I guess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll tell Orly: Orly, if you could help us plot a course, as damaged as we are, heading north to this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shouldn't we get to a port or something before we--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we need to repair first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There ain't no fucking port around here, motherfucker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, maybe there's something over here! He knows about something. Let's ask! Orly? M-m-maybe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Max Headroom, coming at you from the mid-80s! W-w-what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a good thing I grew up a stutterer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Matt is just barely old enough to know what that is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I know Max Headroom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I said you know what it is! Just barely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's funny, I didn't realize who played him until years later and I was like, really, him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, who played him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, what's the actor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He was in The Stand as the Trashcan Man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was, and he played the part of Jobe in Lawnmower Man 2. Anyway!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because this is on a trade run, and this whole isle is part of that, could we make port for more extensive repairs there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a resource stop. It might have some repairs, in your experience. It's not a major port by any means, it's more of a small--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Resupply?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a resupply.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Might have canvas, at least.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can use Divination.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the closest thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From your experience--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Divination? What do you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it's been 24 hours-- once I have a long rest, I can take my morning meditation and ask the Wildmother if there's a place of calm for our boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do a lot of stuff, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would love to have you do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you doing that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to do that. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a way to get that working for you. We'll "all take course and head for that m-m-mighty dangerous part of the sea." He marks it and they set it. You guys have been making your way around the Dragshallow northward towards that area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that past where we're going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is, but we don't have any other--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, in the early morning I'm going to go to the crow's nest and have a ten-minute meditation and ask the Wildmother which direction we should be heading to find some safe harbor to heal ourselves and heal our boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Is this an ability, or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, it is a 4th-level spell, it's Divination.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, there we go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm using it. It takes ten minutes, and you can be as obtuse as you like. You can be a bird that flies in a direction, an insect, or whatever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you for the Shawshank obtuse reference.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. The Wildmother responds-- Actually, let me see what will be the best answer to this one, give me just a second. (stage whisper) Talk amongst yourselves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was seeing if there was anything else I can do-- I'm setting day two spells so we'll have food and water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On a side note, so impressed. I walk off with my little tiny one-ounce owl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bye, Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will take the time to turn Frumpkin- I have two uses left with incense- back into a Bengal cat. So he can live his best life as a Bengal cat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (imitating Liam's accent) Bengal cat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Diplomatic cat-munity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get that situated. Anybody else doing anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your answer, by the way, is: "Bisaft Isle brings you safest harbor in what you seek."

lines.name: TALIESIN, SAM
lines.text: Bisaft.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a warm, gentle embrace that comes with the words, an understanding, and a familiar matronly guidance that brings you calm on the ocean seas that have long brought you anxiety. For the first time in probably a good number of weeks, you get to walk out on that deck, take a deep breath of ocean air, and feel really confident.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sea smells different today. Might just be the charred boat and-- Oh, no. Bisaft.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You look rejuvenated. Did you say Bisaft?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bisaft. We're to head towards Bisaft.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're sure?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure as anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right then. You can let Orly know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Orly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mm-hmm?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Know the Isle of Bisaft?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I'm quite familiar."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That seem to be the direction we're heading right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "About as close as any direction gets, really." Other eye, even.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that might be the place we ought to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Making it jump around a bit, guys. "Mm. Very well. M-m-make sure to point this ship in that direction."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the first day we were on this boat, me and Beau and others were going to go into Avantika's cabin and snoop around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh right. I rolled an 18 and a 19 ten minutes ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if I rolled. I don't think I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't roll yet either, but I was going to crawl in through the hole in her floor if it's still there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's still there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To avoid any traps, and then look around the door from the inside to see if she had trapped it or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an investigation check on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it is not trapped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll open it and let you guys in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled an investigation check ten minutes ago at disadvantage and the lower is a 27. My investigation is plus eight. I'm smart--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The lower was 19?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. I rolled an 18 and a 19.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'll show Caleb around the room that I've already been in to see if he can find anything else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in there too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing around, you find-- There's her dresser with a number of outfits, coats, shirts, things that belong to the captain that you guys get to distribute as you see fit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (cartoon voice) Hey, look at me! I'm Avantika!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there any more gigantic hats?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say teddies, but...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a few hats, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gigantic hats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika-sized hats.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she have a fragrance or anything? Like a perfume?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chanel No. 5.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say you do find some scented oils, but that's the extent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's not a perfume keeper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How about that statue above the door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, her little altar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The altar is still there, the altar to Uk'otoa.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The maps-- the stuff behind her, charting out where she was going, anything in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You find a few other maps and things that refer to a-- You see it breaking down the different trade routes, and you see other paths breaking out; those that try and avoid the trade routes to avoid the pirates. Those different paths they might take at different times of the year to try and head off people that are trying to avoid the waters that they're looking in. You find maps that deal with the path to Urukayxl, and you see the handwritten map by Jamedi that was the path you guys were lead through on Urukayxl to find the temple. You find another map that has circled heavily the archipelago that you've already sussed out, and you find recent notes on that same map that refer to the loose area circled where your ship went down that time ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will we pass over that area as we're heading towards Bisaft?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you'll get near that area. If you want to head that way, you can let Orly know to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's on the way...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you in this room with us too, right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm just asking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find a lot of those materials. You get the sense that, aside from the maps, most of the information that she had, she kept in that book.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any supplies list? Any inventory: canvas on board, things to make supplies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find a number of fine cheeses, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chocolate dipped strawberries, champ-pag-nay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not quite. All the good food was kept for the captain and some of it's turning a little, but it's cheese. Some better treats and some sugared candies that were kept specifically, like a private stash for the captain, you manage to find.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While we're down there, looking around, I'm going to say: So, you know, it's just the three of us down here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm sitting on the bed right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have some secrets between us already.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's been a while since just the three of us have been in a room together.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait a second, look at me. I'm sitting on the bed. I am the servant of a demigod. This is going to be very hard for Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, well...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? You're jumping around so much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can get back to what you're talking about, but think about it for a moment; it's just the three of us, right? We have our heads in the same game. We are the three assholes in this group, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm asshole adjacent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's quite pleasant, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She might be better than both of us combined.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm joking because this has been such a hard day, but Fjord is going to find this very difficult.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to protect him, like we always do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which part difficult? Losing his fuck buddy? It's not that difficult.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is minimalizing what he is dealing with right now. He is trying to find a father, he has compromised himself with this woman for us, for himself, for all of our safety. It is going to be difficult for him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course it's minimalizing, have you met me? Everything I do is minimalizing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have your pluses and your minuses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Speaking of your pluses: the Expositors? You're special forces, did I hear that correctly? Is that what you are called?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true? It seemed pretty true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what Caleb said.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's mostly true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean-- How do you know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, how do you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She is too educated. She is too in-the-know to talk the way she does, to be interested in just drinking and chasing our barbarian friend. She is very educated. I don't know which parts are true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, which parts are true?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to take a guess?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you're a secret agent! I think you're on a dangerous mission- a life or death mission- to find bad guys and take them down! To get the collar and bring them in to the po-po, or something. I don't know how it works! I'm not a secret agent, you are!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's very romanticized, but on that note: Caleb, do you think you could recreate that cipher that you made and have one on hand?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course. That is easy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd like a copy, if you don't mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, what are friends for.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have a license to kill?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Got them right here, Nott. Just these-- No, that wasn't working? No? All right. Yeah, it's a little true, but not as intense as you think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there others like you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Monks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Expositors?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Delta Force.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you know who's who? Do you have a sign? Secret handshake?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of new to it all, to be honest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys are really cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. I am looking forward to getting back to the mainland, and I don't mean the Menagerie Coast. Although... We need to get Jester back to her mother if we can, but I am not looking forward to being here anymore. I want to get back to the Empire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Speaking of time that it takes to travel, are we sure that Avantika was the only one who was interested in what Uk'otoa has to offer?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, there is still Vandren. I have read every inch of her notes, I have communicated them to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess what I'm saying is, are we still going to be competing against others once the Plank King successfully deciphers that book?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would imagine the Plank King would not know what to make of it. It clearly damns her. It does not give him enough information-- He wouldn't know what to do with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does kind of sound like a wives' tale.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he's not a big thinker. He is formidable, but not a big thinker. I think we will have an easier time getting to this boat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go talk about it with the others, I think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your secret is safe with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Above deck, can I go find Fjord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So... that happened. (giggles)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you feel about it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Relieved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I was worried for a moment there. I knew it was going to come to something like that, but Caleb pulling the trigger the way he did was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he cause that explosion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did a lot of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He did. He's very strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So now we're going to find the place where your ship wrecked, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think so, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't get to ask them about Vandren, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I didn't. It hurts to see so many react to a name that only meant so much to me, but-- I don't even know if he's alive. We might find him down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. Do you think if we find him, you'll stop talking like him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, I could probably send a message to the Plank King and ask him about Vandren, if you want me to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I can send him a message the same way I try to talk to my mama, and the Gentleman, and Kiri sometimes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You send messages to Kiri?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, just that she's really cute, and that I miss her, and I wish I could see her, and I hope she's enjoying herself, and that I am sorry that we haven't seen each other in a while, and that we are pirates, and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can she respond to these messages?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She usually responds with, "We're pirates, and I miss you, and--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Jester) Go fuck yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she doesn't say that. She says, "Yes, I'm very cute," a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. I suppose, what would you put in the letter to the Plank King?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever you want me to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I don't know if it's necessary. I can't think of anything as of yet. I don't know, maybe I'll just let you know. Thank you for offering, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course. Your teeth are coming in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw it peek out of your lip just now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, all right. Yeah. Thank you for not telling the others.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got to go check on Orly, make sure we're going the right way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to go see if everything's mended over this way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mended over this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put a piece of paper back together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to take you about a week to get to the location that you're seeking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The boat or the island?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The island.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the island's going to take longer than that-- to get to where the last time you recall your ship going down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With our shit all fucked up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it would take a shorter time. It's about eight days or so to get there, eyeballing it from here, I'd say. More than that, ten days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we cast Control Water to get us there faster at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have access to Control Water?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course I do.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: You do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I can do that every day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'll say, with the Control Water--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking secrets.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, I might be able to do that too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, everyone has Control Water, don't they? I've got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've been waiting to drop it. Fucking water genasi heritage, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, never mind-- oh, yeah, I've got it, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's in the cleric list, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a cleric-- oh god! d4 just went flying!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between the two of you, it allows you a brief moment where you can actually surge the water and grant you a speed boost. I'd say that'll cut three days off of your travel-- the two of you, each day, spending that slot to push it. It's like a speedboat burst. All of a sudden, your giant, three-mast ship is going (crashing water), speedboating across the ocean briefly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it an event each day? Does the crew come out and we all join. Like, "Yeah!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like in Mary Poppins; everyone holds the china.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And 12 o'clock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And let's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're so stupid, Rose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you make your way to the open waters in the vicinity of-- Orly goes with you each day and looks about and gives you the once-over and goes, "I'm pretty sure that we're "pretty dang close to that place you were asking about."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I appreciate that, Orly. Hey, Caduceus, do you have any way of, I don't know-- you've got those vibes, right?-- feeling down and, I don't know, doing a little ping on the bottom?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you-- I don't entirely understand what you're--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know, I don't want to put you in a box or anything, but you seem to pick up the most.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to see if I get-- oh, for the ship. I don't know. That's a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That'd be a Locate Object sort of situation?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got Locate Creature. Yeah, we've both got Locate Object, so we can both help with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What object?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll summon the falchion and I'll say: Maybe try to locate this, and I'll point towards the eye. Not this eye, but a similar eye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you mean your penis?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's a thousand-foot range, and it has to be something familiar to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm looking for a boat. I'm looking for a ship. I'm looking for a shipwreck, not an object. We could do object, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to look for his.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's 2nd-level? It lasts for ten minutes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we can take turns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and how many spell slots do you have 2nd-level each?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three each.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you're both trading off, it's about three chances per type of use per day. How many days you want to spend looking total?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long do we have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have unlimited supplies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, these guys can summon stuff with magic, if I recall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, so the food ain't good, but it's edible and the water's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Until we find it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah? What, like two days and then go fix the boat proper and come back if we have to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. Maybe that's a team discussion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about we spend two to three days, and if we don't find it, we can go and repair the boat proper or at least get the materials to do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can cast it at level three also, which is another--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we find it, though, and we go down there-- we can't go down there. Can we go down there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure we can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then we can't make a hasty retreat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it might be smart to have a boat that actually works before we go down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess we could do a recon first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There still begs the question of, is someone else going to come looking for this? Now that the Plank King--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like that we're here now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We gave the book with the cipher over, so if anybody else wants it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we ripped out the page saying where to find--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did! Oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All the pertinent information is also in here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We all have the ability to travel under the waves with great ease.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do? How? I don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a way of making it so that water becomes like air for you down there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it feel like water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It feels a little thicker, like if you were in a really dense fog, maybe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it's still water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you can breathe it, so it's really not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or you could stay above if you wanted to send a Message if some trouble appears on the horizon, I'd just hate to leave you behind on such a great adventure. There could be buttons, there could be little jewels, ingots--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you talk down to me. I know what you're up to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you talking about? Iit's the bottom of the ocean. Ships throw people all the time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Full disclosure, I could help you cope with--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He thinks I'm going to go into the water for some fucking buttons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I heard tell there was a button ship that crashed right along the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, the old button ship legend, really?! Oh! Buttonbeard the Pirate?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He had buttons for beards!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott the Brave. We have things to accomplish here. If you allow me, I could do what I have done in the past a little sneakily to help you cope with this fear you have. If you allow me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I appreciate that, Caleb, but I've got my own way of doing it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it Mike Myers?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There might be bronzed shoes, maybe little silver cups. Decoder rings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, those spoons? The little spoons, the collectible ones? Fuck this guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not there yet, though, we're talking in advance at this point? All in advance?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're coming upon the area, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Altogether with the eight of them, it cuts the travel time down to five days. So you've got time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll think about it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be stocking us up on food too, so that there's more than enough food and water for the whole group.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pewter? Plates? Those little collectible plates from the Stanford Mint or whatever?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we're going to hang around this area before we get to the boat wrecks, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so taking your time, I would like you to each to roll a base wisdom check for each pass as you go through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You two, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. d20 plus your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God. Nine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm doing save. I'm so sorry. Fuck, I was doing the wrong--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit! I was, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is just check. Add your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even lower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I said 19? 16, and then 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll again. Your third spell slot of the first day, hitting this space and scanning the load.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and you're utilizing your memory of passage through here, as well as Orly's direction on this ocean. Go ahead and roll an intelligence check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the second day, roll again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three in a row, yeah. Unless you want to use more spell slots to do more. So you can do your 3rd-level to burn as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. 20 on the first roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 on the first roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lame on the second roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 14 on the second roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sneezes) Pardon me. Thank you. (sneezes) Pardon. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a three-sneezer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I am, at least.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we try one more?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 16, 19. Yeah, let's blow another. What else are we going to do for the day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfuck!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an intelligence check for you as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Fuh-jord-y!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You go through the second day, and towards the end, you, Caduceus, sense a brief moment where something ship-related catches your attention, and then is gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had a moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. It's gone now. Would I know direction, even?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vague direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we're moving, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're moving. So it's like, all right, let's go ahead and turn it around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just point. Caleb will know the direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn the ship back in the direction of where it goes. At the very end of the second day, just as dusk is starting to creep in, you make your way back in the area, and you sense another hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh. Should I use another 3rd-level spell and try to find the orb-y thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do one more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you're attempting to find the orb, roll a wisdom check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll also join in for one more for that as well. It's my last spell slot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You lose your concentration on the Locate Object.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The next morning, you can attempt again if you like, both of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, you got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bless or something. Do a Bless!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have Bless!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bless us!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another intelligence check for me as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, this is a check, not a save, so it wouldn't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and I want to learn the cantrip Guidance, but I don't know any good healers that can teach it to me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Druids can teach it, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One last one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is your second spell slot used today?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfuck. I'm going to use a third.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was my third, was 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Between the 21 and your 20 intellect in guiding the ship around, you find yourself now collecting a secondary blip. Once again, on the ship, not on the eye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was on the orb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're concentrating on the orb, or the ship?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was concentrating on the ball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ball? You find nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that means it's probably not down there, but I'd still like to take a look.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we close? What are you telling us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think so. We're starting to round an area that I think we could probably fan out and explore amongst the seven of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just got my cat back, but if you want an octopus to look on the bottom, you have it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a very good idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is, actually. If it wouldn't be too much trouble, Caleb, that would be--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I have just enough incense to-- yeah sure, let's make an octopus. Cat-shaped. An octopus-shaped cat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wow. How far does your octopus' connection go for?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I can tell him to go look and he'll come back to me. I can see through him for--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but how far is your connection?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out my book and I set it on the deck and I start working on turning my cat into an octopus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does this mean we don't have to go in the water?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, this means we'll probably have to go in the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Why? He's got an octopus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An hour later, an octopus pops out, if we wait that long.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'd be okay with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you create a Frumpkin octopus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. (sighs) Well, we had one or two days together. Just throw him off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (splashing) Frumpkin makes his way in the darkness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also going to put Bless on the octopus before it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. How long does it last?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's one minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'll watch for the first thousand feet, but I assume he goes beyond that, because it's the ocean, so he keeps going down and down and down. I will tell him to look for this wreck, for what we are looking for, and when he finds it to come back and tell me about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a perception check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. About an hour goes by. Nothing. Roll again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin goes beyond your visual range for a bit. You start getting worried, and then Frumpkin returns and is making his way quickly towards the ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If he's within 1000, we have a connection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 100-foot is the connection.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A hundred? Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe he'll see Dashilla.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe it's 10,000.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, the distance doesn't matter for what you can see through his eyes. It's a 100 feet for it to communicate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, we've established that. I can see indefinitely. That's what we established early in the campaign with the circus, but I can't communicate with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, during that time. So yeah, you watch through Frumpkin's eyes as he makes his way toward the-- finally finding the floor of this ocean. Over this second hour of his search, he catches one shape that is emerging like an obelisk on the bottom of the ocean. Upon getting close enough, you can see it looks to be the front of a wrecked ship, itself damaged and caked in minerals, ocean floor plant life, barnacles. It appears to be a damaged ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it have a name?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't hear any of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) Does it have a name?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're in my ear. Ow!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, he has found the ship. This is a reminder I can't hear any of you. I don't want to disconnect. Don't give me wet willies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give him a wet willie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six wet willies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: His ears are just dripping saliva.

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Frumpkin does a circle on it, before feeling confident that he's discovered at least something of interest, and then beelines it back to the Squalleater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's a good boy?! You are the best cat that was ever put on this planet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then Frumpkin is now there at the surface of the water, without really a way getting back into the ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there you go, back in your shoulder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, come here you. You are the most important member of this team and don't let Beauregard tell you different. Or Nott.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you ever feel like your relationship with your cat is hindering building stronger relationships with human people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've told him that a lot of times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel concerned about you sometimes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that is so silly, isn't it? Silly, yes it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell us what he found!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He found the boat, Nott. he found the boat. He will lead us to the boat. He found it. He did it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is great news. Does anybody not want to join? Really? You want to stay up here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far down is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the bottom of the ocean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And how far is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's thousands of feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it wasn't a thousand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thousands of feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over an hour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh, fuck that. No way!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, just barely. From the distance where you are now. It'd be just under a thousand if you were right over, but you're not entirely certain how far. The boat isn't set for that currently.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have a method to bring us down there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this method?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Describe it to me. I've read a bit. Explain it to the goblin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll cast a little-- on you and for 24 hours, you can breathe underwater freely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a whole day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you still have to move through the water, you still have to swim through it--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You could hold onto my shoulders if you wanted to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could we give ourselves some weights to get us down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got weight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Concrete shoes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sounds terrifying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, we could take a few of the cannonballs to just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should have weights that weigh us down there.

lines.name: LAURA
