lines.text: Will the breathing underwater, will that make it to where our ears won't hurt really bad? Because I hear when you go down underwater, your ears hurt really bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's because of the air. You're going to have to equalize.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your ears hurt bad too? Jesus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But if you're breathing water, there's no air to expand or contract.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Won't you crush under the pressure of the water after a certain point?.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: After a certain depth. There's only one way to find out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now, you people have not read about-- you don't understand magic. It's not like that. I want to try this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. I do, too. Those that want to join, join me at the rail. I'll jump on and sit on the rail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, wait! We have to get a good night's sleep. We just used all of our spells finding this shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah. That's a good point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's have them. Let's tell the crew what's up. Early in the morning, at first light.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's too late. Fjord's in the water, swimming around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caduceus, you making breakfast?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm always making breakfast. I'm not going to even use the weird plants.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll get up for Caduceus' breakfast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been putting that weird fruit in everyone's food for a week now, by the way. Just so we're clear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In minimal amounts, or full dose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The stuff that you found at Urukayxl?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just kidding, but wouldn't that be great?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be amazing

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone's just be like, "Wow!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was no battle. There was no battle with Avantika, man!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not on the boat, we're in sand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's no nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're sitting in your mom's sitting room right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys have another night's rest. As you wake up the next morning, it is raining. There appears to be a small storm making its way in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are the fish out? Fish always come out when it rains.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, once you make it in the ocean, you'll find out. Noticeably, Yasha is energized with the coming of the storm. Seems to be in more energetic spirits than you're used to seeing her. You guys complete your meal for breakfast. You gather your supplies. What are you going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll leave Orly in command while we head under. To complete this spell, I'm going to need everyone to hold hands in a circle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would like to sing a little Kumbaya song and refresh everybody on the Diver's Grave, which is where we are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to sing that Diver's Grave song?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Kumbaya, the cursed woman--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Dashilla the Dreadful--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Kumbaya Dashilla, Dashilla with claws that grasp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we need to have the rights to that song?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Oh god I hope not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) And a hungry eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) She's got a hungry eye and with a lantern light. Dashilla, the cursed woman, treasures in her eyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh. Cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Dashilla the cursed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am casting Mage Armor during whatever the fuck this is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you give us anything for that? Did we get bonuses or did we just get to hear you sing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that was Keyleth. Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was literally just Beau singing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just me trying to do--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, while it's happening, because it was such a good song, I will cast Underwater Breathing on all seven of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My song was that good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, all of you now have the capability for the next 24 hours to breathe underwater. Your lungs feel heavier than they do while you breathe air. It's unique. No gills sprout from the side of your neck, per se, but the air itself seems to have a weight to it, and you're like (exhales). It's still breathable air, but the process seems to have changed a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the abyss.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In preparation for this, I went and I gathered a few sandbags. Took some burlap, filled them with--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no sand to fill them with out in the ocean, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cannonballs?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, yeah sure. I got the eight-pounders.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have to clear that with me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I brought out a few-- but look, I'm the barrel person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note, too, when the Squalleater came to port that night, Darktow was resupplied with cannonballs on board. For those who are keeping track, which would be--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You. The ship currently has a cache of 30 cannonballs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice. How many are you taking?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we could just use four and have two people hold on to the same cannonball.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that makes sense. Nott and I are sharing one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You maneuver the boat slowly also closer to where Frumpkin saw because when Frumpkin found it, it was at an angle away from you, which is how it was just beyond the range of a thousand feet. Moving over, it's probably close to 700 feet below.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So Frumpkin is pinwheeling in front of all of us leading the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't suppose we have 700 feet of rope on this ship, do we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have an anchor. It can only go down so far, but I don't know how--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true. How far does the anchor go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 200 feet? 100 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not going to go that far.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, ships don't go to anchor in the middle of the ocean. They just float.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you're ready, take a seat on the rail and I'll hop up and put my butt out towards the sea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to be dark down there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have light spells?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (popping)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dancing Lights. You cast Light on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On my staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha casts Light on her sword, the Magician's Judge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need a minute!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You need a minute?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to drink heavily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the point where you're intoxicated?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To the point of intoxication.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's important because I switched the Transmuter's Stone away from darkvision, so I cannot see in low light, so it's got to be guiding lights for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take Sprinkle out of my hood--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah, smart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This poor little-- it's better over the days that it's been able to spend with you since Darktow, but this ferret's been through quite a few experiences.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're like a super ferret. You're like the strongest little animal I've ever seen. I mean, really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (ferret chattering) Then he curls up. He hears a loud noise (startled chittering).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scarred for life.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's just fucked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Orly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a rescue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm?" I can't remember which eye it is anymore. I'll have to go check. "Mmm?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you like weasels?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a weird opener.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It never ends well. There's no right answer to that question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a weasel and I don't want to take him underwater.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Water weasel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Orly's head retracts into the shell slightly with this look of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Orly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marius steps up and goes like, "I'm happy to look after him. Actually been quite a while since "I've seen a pet."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. Who said that?

lines.name: SAM, MATT
lines.text: Marius LePual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who you've dragged all the way from Nicodranas--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But he's got a good tan now and some scars, his clothes are kind of fucked up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's like Guy Threepwood now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does look a little more ocean-wearied. As prim and proper and put together as Marius was at Nicodranas, he's definitely rocking more of a Pirates of Penzance thing now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He went from level two to three. Doing good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll take good care of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you don't, I will know and I will give you a tattoo. If you do take good care of him, though, I will give you a better tattoo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are those the only options?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, if you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Hello-- oh!" (nervous laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He likes to eat fruit. He likes to eat cheese. He likes to eat bugs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we only have the one food that you've been creating on the ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He likes it if you talk to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have bugs and cheese.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we got bugs and cheese.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Well, come. Let's get you some cheese and-- oh, that's my hand you're peeing in, okay."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We always got bugs and cheese, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He carries him off. All right, you gather your supplies, you gather your cannonballs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the count of three, when you're ready, you'll lean backwards off the rail and fall into the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the count of three, when you're ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it stands, the cannonballs are smooth, solid metal. How are you bringing them down with you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a couple of options here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to hold on to the sides.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we want to be able to carry them so if we have some small bags maybe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like rope or chain? Oh! Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can just put them in a bag that we can hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That can be done. You do have a few sacks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're iron, right? I would say that with Nott piggybacking, Caleb would take his dagger and transmute it into iron to meld with the cannonball and grip it that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, make a little handle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow it, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another one, a sack around it. Actually, a few of them you can put sacks around it, so--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to share a cannonball, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cad, you and me? What's Yasha doing, is she coming with us or is she invigorated by the storm?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She gets her own cannonball because she's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she's coming with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, she's just like that. Just holding it like a beast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Palming it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Globetrotters.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ready? One, two, three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You splash and break the surface of the ocean. As you all begin to sink slowly beneath the waves, the light begins to get darker and darker the further down you pass. The shades of green-blue begin to turn to a deep green-brown, and even that light begins to fade, just having the few points of light that you are bringing along with yourselves towards the bottom of the ocean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I try to catch Nott. How is she doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eyes totally closed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you breathing well? I give her a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott has not taken a breath yet, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: International sign for breathe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get to a point, Nott, where your lungs hurt so much you cannot help but breathe in, and there is a moment of panic as suddenly water rushes into your lungs and the nightmare you've had many times kicks in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, that means go down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a little bit to adjust and anxiety is still spiked in you, but you begin to find yourself breathing water in and out-- like thicker air, but still air-- and it's more comfortable than you expected.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we talk down here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't have the same volume you do above water, which means you can cast spells underwater without issue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, same as you had before. It carries vibration and sound travels far, but it loses enunciation at longer distances, but you can hear voices longer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are four globules of light slowly circling around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gurgling) When we get back to the surface, I will kill you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was pretty good, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this is going to be awful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gurgling) Well listen, Nott, as long as we're down here--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cannot do that joke anymore. That joke has past.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your feet find the bottom of the ocean after minutes. Ten minutes. Who knows how much time has past? It seemed longer than you expected until you eventually you hit the bottom of the ocean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look up. What do I see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the faint bit of light above where it marks where the sunlight is hitting the waves, but it's an impossible distance from you from this perspective. There are heavy, slowly shifting arms, waving tassels of kelp and sea vegetation slightly drifting and moving with every faint bit of water that gets maneuvered through with each wave and push as it goes, and you can feel it move you a few inches and you have to readjust as each one pushes through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like another world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You realize there shouldn't be waves this deep necessarily.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are they coming from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over and watch as a large creature is not that far away from you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without a Trace on all of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I dim the light.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't see anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a faint (whale singing) and glance over the left. You can see a whale making its way through the water about 50, 60 feet from you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't see shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not with a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I put my goggles on by the way--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're good. I'm blind and are you blind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He still has the light. You can still see; Caduceus and Yasha still have the light on their weapons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was waiting until we knew that we were okay. I move my light over to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whale continues on, slowly moving, not really acknowledging your presence. You can see two other smaller whales alongside it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aww, baby calves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey. Technically they can understand me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone make an investigation check. This will be perception. Underwater, perception.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Disadvantage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At disadvantage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Just me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for Yasha as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five for her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes you a little while, about two to three hours of searching the bottom of the ocean. You're starting to get a little hungry again from all the strenuous activity of moving and dragging these cannonballs with you to keep you weighted down so you can step across the surface. You come past some deep sea corals and beautiful colorful visions and schools of fish scooting and coasting around. At one point, they swarm past you, and you feel them tickling past your torso before they skitter past. Eventually, this lift begins to descend into a small bowl or at least a point where the shelf begins to head in a downward direction at a decline. Within the next 15 or so minutes of traveling in that direction, you see the outline of a familiar ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I push forward towards it. Point and start to swim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll find out next week!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, Matt.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: What a game!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a good session, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One of the best ever. So many great games!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That went some interesting places. There's a number of scenarios that didn't happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was a number of scenarios that didn't happen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like there was so much more on the island that we did not--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a lot more on that island.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's Allison, there was shit alleys, and there was all kinds of fun stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just because we're banished doesn't mean we're never going back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We keep pissing off the towns.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm so sorry. Like a cop said "you're trespassing" and now we're just going to never trespass again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, we're not because we're law abiding citizens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, when you go into a convenience store and it's got the "Have you seen "this person?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This campaign is a social experiment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah. This has gone really interesting, fun places. Well, thank you guys. I'm excited to pick this up next week at the shipwreck. Thank you guys for tuning in. Yeah, I missed this-- two weeks off and suddenly--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All the dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were freaking out all for two weeks straight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys had some good, solid plans.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Our plan was okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was entirely worth the amount of data it took up on my phone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It worked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think all anyone asked is for some slight improvements in our planning over the years. Slight improvements.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it worked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Man, most of D&D is about plans that go fucking tits up the minute you try and talk about it. Everyone is like, "Oh, they planned so terribly." Every D&D game, everyone plans terribly. Sometimes plans go great, and those are the ones you remember when you compare it to other people. "Oh, we're great planners. Remember that two times over the past 18 years we played where "our plans went great? Those are the times we'll always bring up and judging other people's plans." Yeah, everyone has some good plans every now and then. More often than not, plans go pretty shitty and that's fun. Anyway, thank you all for coming and watching along with us after the two week break. Thank you D&D Beyond for being our amazing friends and sponsors. We'll see you in a week and remember we love you all--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (creepy voice) Is it Thursday yet? (growling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You did this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm so upset. (normal voice) Take it away, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) [music]
